name: Gaurav Singhal
description: Gaurav was previously the first Lead Data Scientist at the United Nations World Food Programme, holds MSc degrees in Economics and Information Science from the University of Michigan.

name: Dr. Laurence E. Day
description: Laurence was previously a risk analytics software engineer at Standard Chartered Bank specialising in functional programming, and holds a PhD in Computer Science PhD from the University of Nottingham.

name: Nupur Joshi
description: Nupur was previously a McKinsey & Company multi-stakeholder strategy and operational transformation consultant, and holds an MBA from Wharton.
